original_text: As soon as the angel of the Lord spoke these words to all the people of Israel, the people lifted up their voices and wept.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 이스라엘 모든 자손에게 이 말씀을 이르매 백성이 소리를 높여 운지라

sentences.original_text: As soon as the angel of the Lord spoke these words to all the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 사자가 이스라엘 모든 백성에게 이 말씀을 하자마자

sentences.original_text: the people lifted up their voices
